info.name: TuneCent API - Complete with All Responses (68 Endpoints)
info.description:
Complete TuneCent Backend API Collection with SAVED RESPONSES for every endpoint

**Total Endpoints:** 68
**All endpoints have example responses!**

**Environment Variables:**
- `base_url`: http://localhost:8080 OR https://tunecent.fabian.web.id
- Endpoints already include /api/v1 path
